mapper.insert: insert into subOrder (customerId, goodId, goodPrice, shippingPrice, createdTime, finishedTime, orderStatus, shippingAddress, goodName, companyId, companyName) values (#{customerId}, #{goodId}, #{goodPrice}, #{shippingPrice}, #{createdTime}, #{finishedTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{shippingAddress}, #{goodName}, #{companyId}, #{companyName})
